room_title: Escape room "Zoe" by Escaped Las Vegas: ZOE in Las Vegas
review: My family and I just completed this escape room and it was absolutely a blast!! We had a great time. There are 4 different rooms to venture through and figure out puzzles in order to get to the next room. There are live actors as well to add a little enhancement to the "living in a horror movie" feeling. I don't want to give too much away, but be sure to close the doors on your way to the next room or you may have some "followers":). There was a lot of laughter, and even more screaming (mainly from me...they said I could be heard from the outside...) and my family and I would definitely come again! Thank you for the awesome experience Zoe :D!

room_title: Escape room "Zoe" by Escaped Las Vegas: ZOE in Las Vegas
review: If you're looking for a haunted attraction year round in Vegas, look no further than Escaped Las Vegas: Zoe! Not only do you get great complex puzzles, but creepy well executed scares. If you want an "amped up scare experience" make sure to tell the host and it will make the experience even better! Awesome job!
